name: cosmowiki
description: an online encyclopedia about astronomy and space flight

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist; npm run build:html; npm run build:data; npm run build:css; npm run build:app
scripts.build:html-for-offline: cp src/index.html dist; npm run modify-for-offline
scripts.build:css: cp -R src/css dist; cp -R src/img dist
scripts.build-for-offline: npm run build; npm run modify-for-offline
scripts.watch:build: npm run build; parallelshell 'npm run watch:build:app' 'npm run watch:build:html' 'npm run watch:build:data' 'npm run watch:build:css' 'npm run watch:build:img'
scripts.watch:build-build-for-offline: npm run build-for-offline; parallelshell 'npm run watch:build:app' 'npm run watch:build:html-for-offline' 'npm run watch:build:data' 'npm run watch:build:css' 'npm run watch:build:img'

author: H. Porsch
